item.title: Bangalore to Talakadu Historical Site – A Couple Motorcycle Ride Travel Plan
item.description: Talakadu, on the banks of the river Kaveri, is a fascinating blend of history, mythology, and natural beauty. Once a flourishing city with more than 30 temples, Talakadu is today partly buried under shifting sand dunes, earning it the name “The Desert of Karnataka.” For a couple riding out of Bangalore on a motorcycle, this trip is the perfect mix of adventure, romance, and heritage.
